author: Staff Reporter
text: Power supply will be suspended in the following areas from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Thursday, owing to maintenance work to be taken up in Sipcot substation: Milavittan, Chinnakannupuram, Pandarampatti, Pudur Pandiapuram, All India Radio Station, Sipcot Complex, Madathur, Postal and Telegram area, Third Mile, Paththinathapuram and Sankar Colony.
title: Power shutdown
